blog.description: Chris Evans and Steve Rogers imagines. Requests OPEN. Smut requests/NSFW requests accepted. Requests for permanent taglist also OPEN. Masterlist here.

title: Always and Forever
body:
Hey guys. This has been on my mind since the movie. I’ve been imagining what would Steve’s reaction be when his girlfriend is a victim of the Thanos Snap and this is my version. It’s not long. It’s more like a scene. Send me messages or comments on what you think Steve’s reaction would be in your opinion :)

Pairings: Steve Rogers (Nomad) x Reader

Warnings: NONE

P.S. Please forgive my shitty writing. I’ve been suffering with writer’s block and it’s like if I write anything, it would be soooooooo bad because of poor construction of sentences and bad usage of words. Ugh. I hate this. I don’t know when I’ll be able to get my normal writing self back but please bear with my shittyness for a while. 

“What just happened?” you heard Natasha say.

You struggle to stand up on your feet and as you were up, you looked around you to see people turning to ashes.

“Steve?” You heard Bucky say.

Your eyes widened as you see Bucky slowly turning to ashes himself.

Your heart sank when you see Steve fell to his knees beside the ashes of his best friend.

You were about to run to Steve to comfort him but you suddenly felt weaker.

Letting out a sharp exhale, you felt one of your legs give way causing you to kneel on the other leg.

Natasha notices you and calls out, “Steve!”

Steve’s head snaps to Natasha’s direction and then to yours.

“No.” He whispers under his breath before rushing towards you.

You gather your strength to stand up, but you couldn’t. Instead, your head fell to the forest floor.

You knew what was going to happen and it broke your heart knowing that you’ll be leaving Steve when you’ve promised him to always be by his side.

“No, no, no. Please.” Steve says to you in a shaky voice. He scoops you into his arms and cradles your body.

“I-I can’t lose you too. Not you.” Steve’s lips quivered, “Please.” He begged to you. He knew begging wouldn’t stop what was going to happen to you but he did anyway.

You couldn’t feel your legs. It started.

His eyes were already filled with despair, sorrow and tears.

He lifts up your hand and kisses it before placing it against his cheek.

“I won’t let him take you too.” He whispers.

You manage to move your thumb in an effort to stroke Steve’s cheek before your arms started to dissipate.

“I love you. Always…” You whisper. The corners of your mouth twitched as you managed to smile one last time for Steve. You wanted to finish your sentence but you couldn’t.

Steve closed his eyes tightly, not wanting to see you disappear before his eyes.

“And Forever.” Steve manages to blurt out in an almost inaudible voice, still not wanting to open his eyes.

As the last of you turns to ashes, Steve’s hand clenched into fists when he couldn’t feel you in his arms anymore.

Steve’s whole body started to shiver in anger. He clenches his jaw as he throws his head back letting out a loud grieve-stricken cry.

I specially write Loki, Tony, Bucky and Steve imagines. Just ask me if you want a different Marvel character.

summary:
Imagine:

 Steve saves you and Natasha from the Winter soldier. 
You where so shocked that you couldn’t move. 
“(Y/N). (Y/N)!!...
caption:
Imagine:

Steve saves you and Natasha from the Winter soldier.
You where so shocked that you couldn’t move.
“(Y/N). (Y/N)!! We have to go.”, Natasha says and you are still shocked.
“Those eyes….Natasha.”, you look up at her.
“I know who he is.”, you jump up and look for them. They are fighting near a big van.

You run to Steve so you could help him.
“Steve! I know who he is! You have to stop!”, he looks shortly at you and throws the Winter soldier over his shoulder. His mask falls off.

Steve pants slightly and you gulp. The Winter soldier turns around to you two.
“Bucky?”, Steve asks. Tears form in your eyes.
“Who the hell is Bucky?”

Your heart broke after those words. He was going to attack again but Natasha tried to shot him. After the smoke cleared he was gone.

You fall on your knees and start to cry silently.

summary: Anyway, Tony Stark was right. The Avengers were not at all prepared for the end game and well-meaning ideologies ("We'll lose."...
body: Anyway, Tony Stark was right. The Avengers were not at all prepared for the end game and well-meaning ideologies (“We’ll lose.” “Then we’ll do that together.”) don’t win wars against intergalactic despots.

title: Black Widow: Sexual Espionage
body:
Natasha Romanoff is gay. And no one in the Marvel Cinematic Lesbian Universe is safe…

An Avenger’s Consequences

Creeping through the solitary darkness, the Black Widow gradually emerged from the shadows. Slipping through the open courtyard, the redhead vaulted over a high fence before dropping down into a sea…

Read more…
